name: Family (mjf89)
description:
This is one of those games where you need to help the Hero to reach his goals ..

Unfortunately our little hero is going through a big crisis here. He is restless, going back and forth, bouncing off walls without doing anything else. He needs help and this is why, unlike most games where you  would directly control him, in this one you control his family instead.

Move Mom to guide him on the right path,

let Dad help him overcoming obstacles,

and rely on his beloved Brother to protect him from any kind of threat!

Think fast, and switch among them to guide the little hero across a series of difficult levels ..

Controls are configurable and you can use either your keyboard, or your favorite gamepad (strongly suggested).
